import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link as Link2 } from 'react-scroll'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton'; const Courses = () => { const [skeleton, Setskeleton] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => Setskeleton(false), 1000); }) const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const toggle = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; return (
